unittitle_ssm: Robert Thorney and Jemima Frost Craft marriage certificate
abstract_ssm: Marriage certificate of Robert Thorney Craft and Jemima Frost of Queens County, signed by Cadwallader Colden, Lieutenant Governor and Commander in Chief of the Province of New York under King George III. The certificate is dated 1764. Robert Thorney Craft was a joiner by trade.
collection_ssm: Robert Thorney and Jemima Frost Craft marriage certificate
